downloadDescription: Download the Graph Connector Agent used to index on-premises data sources using Microsoft Graph connectors
detailsSection:
Microsoft Graph Connector Agent can be used to index your favorite on-premises data sources such as File-shares, SQL databases etc. using the Microsoft built Graph connectors. The indexed content will be used to power experiences such as Microsoft Search, Viva Topics and more. Learn more: https://aka.ms/GraphConnectors.
For release notes: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftsearch/graph-connector-agent-releases
systemRequirementsSection:
• .Net Framework 4.7.2
  • .NET Core Desktop Runtime 8.0 (x64)
  • 8 cores, 3 GHz
  • 16 GB RAM, 5 GB Disk Space for every 1 million items to be indexed
  • Network access to data source and internet through port 443
installInstructionSection: Download the latest version of the Graph Connector Agent finstall the software by using the installation wizard. More details here: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftsearch/graph-connector-agent#installation
